DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to find a new way of using light to measure the blood flow within the tooth. The researcher develop dental Laser Speckle imaging system tool that can use for exam condition of the tooth. This device is reliable method to provide information to dentists and endodontists during oral examination.
DOC.brief_title: Low-cost, Noninvasive Method to Assess Pulpal Vitality
DOC.detailed_description: In additional to routine oral exam the researcher can use the Laser Speckle imaging system probe with low-level light shine to the problematic tooth to collect blood flow information.
DOC.criteria: Male or female aged 18 to 30. Have one or more teeth requiring endodontic treatment. Participation in other study within 3 months of enrollment in this study, Pregnant Women.
